synopsis.text: Fuwa Kokone, Hanamichi Ran, and Nagomi Yui are three ordinary girls living in Oishi-Na Town, until one day, they're visited by Energy Fairies from the mystical realm of CooKingdom. This magical kingdom is responsible for all the world's cuisine, and its most prized possession, the Recipe-Bon, holds the secrets to every dish. However, the devious Bundoru Gang has stolen the Recipe-Bon, aiming to monopolize all culinary creations. With the Bundoru Gang's next target being the Cuisine Fairy Recipeppi, the Energy Fairies enlist the help of the three girls. In an unexpected turn of events, the girls transform into Pretty Cures, embarking on a mission to recover the Recipe-Bon, protect the delicious smiles of everyone, and save the culinary world from the clutches of the Bundoru Gang.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
